about.title: ABOUT
about.description1: Hello, Im Warren Jaftha, a 22-year-old enthuisiast with an unwavering love for programming.
about.description2: Ever since i was a kid, ive been captivated by the world of technology and the power of code
about.description3: Its remarkable how lines of code can transform abstract ideas into tangible, functional software.
about.description4: My journey into programming began with simple scripts and gradually evolved into complex applications.
about.description5: I believe that programming is a creative outlet where i can turn my imagination into reality.
about.description6: Whether its developing web applications, crafting mobile apps, or even diving into data analysis
about.description7: i relish the opportunity to solve problems and build innovative solution using the language of code

skills.title: HTML
skills.experience: I have been coding in HTML since 2019 all the way to 2023. I have coded multiple websites ranging from simple landing pages all the way to login and registration pages. As you will see by my projects I have coded an entire fully functioning Razor website using html,css and javascript

skills.title: CSS
skills.experience: I am proficient in CSS, I am adept in leveraging its various properties and techniques to style and design web elements effectively.

skills.title: Javascript
skills.experience: I have been coding using Javascript since 2019-2023 using it to provide functionality to websites. The places where I most often used javascript was usually with login and registration pages and when having to interact with databases

skills.title: Java
skills.experience: I have been specializing with coding in Java since 2020-2023. I have coded front-end user interfaces using Java and entire fully functioning Database Management Systems. I also have experience with coding APIs.

testimonials.name: Corne
testimonials.quotes: Warren's programming expertise is exceptional. His knack for problem-solving and dedication to writing clean, efficient code is truly impressive. His efficiency with which he designs his websites is simply put impressive

projects.name: Netflix
projects.description: I built this realistic Netflix replica using bootstrap ,css and html
